name: Tricky Moto Stunt Top Rider
description:
This stunt Moto Stunt Rider game is one of the best bike stunt game.This is the ultimate stunt riding game.Drive, jump and smash your way through the amazing treacherous tracks as you master the realistic physics of bike in high speed stunt adventure. Enjoy the thrilling ride with your favorite bike.Do you think riding bike in a hurdles area with extreme stunts is easy task? Tune your stunt bike and find right balance while high jumps.Stunt bike racing simulator offers insane nitro fueled; use nitrous oxide for incredible stunts! This stunt dirt bike racing provides you an opportunity to become a stunner racer with stunts through the dangerous constructed area.
In this game,your main objective in this simulation is you have to perform crazy stunt and reach at your destination in time.Sit behind the wheels and increase the speed of motorbike while taking jumps through the space on the beautiful wooden ramps. Do some insane amazing impossible tricks and cross the finish line in time. Every level is more exciting and challenging from the previous one.This stunt bike game different obstacles are placed on every level to make your level tougher! Complete mission to ride your bike and use stunt skill through all course in the specific time. Use your decision power to set some unforgettable landmarks on dirt bike stunt simulator history.
You can,enjoy realistic and charming graphics which provides the best riding experience in bike stunt game.In this game you also test your riding skills.If you are a fan of bike stunt riding then play this new latest stunt bike game.You can feel the real sounds of stunt bike, riding in this game.
Features:
- Smooth and steady control
- Realistic stunt ramps and stunts
- Beautiful 3D graphics and environment
- Ultra-Smooth and balancing control
- Amazing selection of tricky bikes
